title: Fix Landing page Admin Portal button to navigate to external Admin Portal URL

requirements.summary: Change the Landing page "Access Admin Portal" button to perform a full-page navigation to the external Admin Portal URL in the same tab, while keeping Customer Portal navigation unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: On the landing page, clicking "Access Admin Portal" performs a full page navigation to https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ in the same tab.
The app does not navigate to /admin/signin when "Access Admin Portal" is clicked.
Customer Portal navigation ("Access Customer Portal" -> /customer/signin) continues to work as before.
Works on mobile browsers as well as desktop browsers.

file_operations.description: Update the "Access Admin Portal" Button click handler to use a full page same-tab navigation to https://nehitha-thandal-managementtool-0c2.caffeine.xyz/ (e.g., window.location.assign/window.location.href), instead of TanStack Router navigation to "/admin/signin". Keep the "Access Customer Portal" button using internal navigation to "/customer/signin". Use the existing shadcn-ui Button component for the UI element; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
